metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15266 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is a Divide-By-Zero inEXTRACTOR_wav_extract_method in wav_extractor.c via a zero sample rate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15266` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extract - 1:1.6-2
libextractor3 - 1:1.6-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libextractor package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.6-2').
